How to Make Brownies from Scratch

First, mix together the dry and wet ingredients in two separate bowls.
Next, combine the wet and dry ingredients.
Then, pour the batter into an 8×8 inch baking pan lined with parchment paper.
Finally, bake!

It is a great 4 v 1 Multiplayer game.  There is no other game like this one, and not getting angry at the other team, killer doing their best to kill, and survivors playing as a team, is the key to make sure you get the best time to enjoy the game. I have been enjoying this game since 2018, and if I take a break, it is because my work gets in the way, but with all the new content, and the devs trying their best to make this game great, always updating content, it makes it a game worthwhile to invest in

Holding W simulator. Gets pretty boring real fast and the devs don't do anything to add any depth into it. Killers in this game are the most pathetic underpowered beings ever existed on earth. They don't even have rights to be called killers because of how little options they have and how slow they are to kill anyone. The mindgames that are the main thing of this game and are supposed to make it fun are actually a pretty rare thing. Nothing can be less exciting than being in a position where you can perfectly calculate the situation around you and come to the conclusion that there's literally nothing you can do but run another 10 loops and then having to break a god pallet just to progress in a match, and god, these devs love god pallets. Yes, there are killers that can somehow work around it, but if you wanna play someone without that ability, i wish you good luck. The lvl design is absolutely unimaginative to the point where the most of the maps look the same only with a different color filter applied to them and have completely the same structures spawning in a bit of a random order. Not to mention the community is probably even more toxic than in moba games. Never before i've seen so many people that get overly excited after literally successfully pressing space, which is kinda hilarious and sad at the same time.
The game is fun for like only the first 50-100hrs if you play solo. It can be for longer if you play with friends, but still the gameplay is extremely simplistic and repetative and doesn't seem to be changing for the better anytime soon.
its fun and scary i enjoy playing with friends

O jogo é divertido nao nego em partes, Tenho mais de 1,500 horas de jogo e posso garantir uma coisa, é estressante para ambos os lados, tanto de assasino quanto de sobrevivente. Acredito que o jogo ainda tem muito decrescer em questao de balanceamento e correçao de bugs. Agora o que mais me irrita no dead by daylight é sua comunidade pois de todos os jogos online que ja joguei sem duvidas é a mais toxica que ja vi. Muita gente folgada que se acha os bonzao tanto assasinos campers quanto sobreviventes folgados que no final da partida ficam se gabando o famoso EZ no chat, o que é bem negativo pois isso e um dos motivos alias que podem levar a novos jogadores desistirem do game. Mais um motivo que pode levar o jogador a desistir é seu matchmaking extremamente ridiculo onde muitas vezes voce sendo rank bronze cair com assasinos rank 1 ou swf rank 1. Ou seja totalmente desproporcional e ridiculo. Agora uma coisa que mais me irrita é o jogo sensurar quase tudo que voce diz no chat pois vivemos a geraçao em que tudo é considerado ofensa, mas permite que jogadores argentinos , chilenos etc fiquem ofendendo nos brasileiros ao nos chamarem gratuitamente de macacos, onde pode até se caracterizar como racismo ou xenofobia, o que me deixa mais puto ainda e saber que nem a steam e nem a behavior produtora do game toma alguma providencia contra isso. na minha opiniao deveriam dar ban permanente nesse pessoal ai que alias peguei nojo por conta dessa falta de respeito toda.
MUCH FUN BIG HAPPY!!!!!!!!!!!!! unless you get flashed and 4 stacked by ttv kids

A solid Asymmetrical-Multiplayer game. Steep Learning curve but a great community and rewarding sense of reward for players. Survivor or Killer experience is a tense and engaging experience all around and one that keeps me coming back!
Its not bad but its not good but its also not good but its also not bad.

JUEGO CULIAO BASURA, LLENO DE TOXICOS QLOS QUE TE CAMPEAN Y TE TUNELEAN, LA OTRA VEZ ME TOCO UN SIMIO CTM QUE TENIA UNA BUILD HECHA EXCLUSIVAMEWNTE PARA IR A CAMPEAR EN EL SOTANO LA LARVA RE QLA MALA, POR LO DEMÁS TIENE UNA GRAN JUGABILIDAD Y UNA GRAN COMUNIDAD, EN LA CUAL TODOS COOPERAN PARA PARA SALIR ADELANTE DE UNA PARTIDA, SOBRETODO EN EL FINAL CUANDO PUTEAS A LOS MACACOS RE QLOS QUE NO HABLAN HUMANO, LO BUENO ES QUE HE APRENDIDO A HABLAR MONO, BASTANTE RECOMENDADO.
